# era(_:)

**Instance Method**

Modifies the date format style to use the specified era format style.

## Declaration

```swift
func era(_ format: Date.FormatStyle.Symbol.Era = .abbreviated) -> Date.FormatStyle
```

## Parameters

- **format**: The era format style applied to the date format style.

## Return Value

A date format style modified to include the specified era style.

## Discussion

Possible values of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Era] include [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Era/abbreviated], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Era/narrow], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Era/wide].

This example shows a variety of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Era] format styles applied to a date:

```swift
let meetingDate = Date() // Feb 9, 2021 at 3:00 PM
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().era(.abbreviated)) // AD
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().era(.narrow)) // A
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().era(.wide)) // Anno Domini
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().era()) // AD
```

If you don’t provide a format, the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Era/abbreviated] static variable is the default format.

For more information about formatting dates, see [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle].

## Specifying the Date Format

- **day(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified day format style.
- **dayOfYear(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified day of the year format style.
- **month(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified month format style.
- **quarter(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified quarter format style.
- **week(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified week format style.
- **weekday(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified weekday format style.
- **year(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified year format style.
- **Date.FormatStyle.DateStyle**: Type that defines date styles varied in length or components included.
